messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] yasuchika koz or is it ?
messages.msgSnippet: Doesn t look promising. Jim please klick........... http://tinyurl.com/6cooa Bought this koz late Sunday at the Chicago show, too late for submitting to
messages.messageBody:
Doesn't look promising.

Jim



please klick...........

http://tinyurl.com/6cooa

Bought this koz late Sunday at the Chicago show, too late for
submitting to shinsa.

I have not seen this " unusal " Yasuchika mei.
Knowing it's difficult to do internet kantei, but anyone seen this
type of mei before ? fake-a-rama ?


milt
